VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: Become immortal
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to become immortal by having a persona stack implanted.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: Have a duplicate
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to have a duplicate of themselves.

VAspirE.AspirationDef.label: Own a legendary sleeve
VAspirE.AspirationDef.description: {0} wants to have their stack implanted into a sleeve of legendary quality.
